title: Classic Puno 3D/2N

activities.text: Reception at the Juliaca airport or bus terminal and transfer to the hotel in Puno. Free day for acclimatization. Recommended: stroll through the historic center or visit the Kuntur Wasi viewpoint.

Transfer to the port of Puno. Boat ride on Lake Titicaca. Visit the floating Uros Islands and then continue to Taquile Island, known for its textile traditions. Typical lunch on the island. Return to Puno in the afternoon.
Breakfast at the hotel. Free time to relax, shop, or take an optional walk. Transfer to the Juliaca airport or bus terminal. End of the tour.

includes: Tour to Uros and Taquile Islands with typical lunch
